ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONTABILIZACAO"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_CONTABILIZACAO() widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_INFORMACOESADICIONAIS"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_INFORMACOESADICIONAIS() widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_DETALHAMENTORUBRICA"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_DETALHAMENTORUBRICA() widget.View.Commands["REMETENTE"].Visible = registro.HabilitarREMETENTE()

def OnOPERACAOValueChanged(view, entity): registro = entity if registro == None: return
view.Commands["CMD_CONTABILIZACAO"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_CONTABILIZACAO()

def OnIMPOSTOValueChanged(view, entity): registro = entity if registro == None: return
view.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_INFORMACOESADICIONAIS"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_INFORMACOESADICIONAIS() view.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Items["CMD_DETALHAMENTORUBRICA"].Visible = registro.HabilitarCMD_DETALHAMENTORUBRICA()
